sentences.sContent: As the car drew abreast of him, Jack suddenly recognised the driver.
sentences.sCn: 那辆车追上来与杰克并行时，他一下子就认出了驾车的人。

phrases.pCn: 与……并驾齐驱；了解……的最新情况
保持与…并列；不落后于；跟上

remMethod.val: a + breast(胸) → 胸和胸并排 → 并排

trans.tranOther: to walk, ride etc next to each other, all facing the same way
